thread.title: A Clueless Dad’s Strange Trip to the Ultimate Tournament

author: Michael W. Miller
title: A Clueless Dad’s Strange Trip to the Ultimate Tournament

organizations.name: division iii national college ultimate championships

text:
“How did our kids wind up in this stoner sport?” my friend Aaron asked as we pulled up to a multi-field complex in Rockford, Ill., where the Preying Manti, the Flying Horsecows, the Spidermonkeys and the Vicious Circles were all warming up. A guy with rainbow-colored hair jogged by us, boomboxes blasted “Teenage Dream,” and flying discs filled the broad Midwestern sky.
We had arrived at the Division III National College Ultimate Championships, an improbably organized oxymoron of an event, given the sport’s roots in 1960s...
